name: Once in Flowerlake
description:
It's a good story in a sci-fi setting with a top-down view, telling the story of a nameless man stuck in a routine, and an event that changed his life forever.
The player will live through a brief moment in the life of a nameless hero, who immediately after his awakening was sent to a distant land to deal with the maintenance of energy production stations. As time went by, one day an event happened that changed his views on whether he had been doing the right thing all that time after awakening.

Features:
  • A calm and moderately kind story, devised by one man, with an ending that will leave food for thought.
  • Nice visual style and atmosphere of a cold, winter world.
  • Relaxed soundtrack to maintain the right atmosphere.

Important note: the game is a one-man effort and does not have a long playthrough time. It is important to me that you know this right away, so you won't be disappointed after your purchase. Thank you for your understanding!
